descript.abstract: Charter Communications, ERC, and COA fiber-optic cable location data.
descript.purpose: Data submitted to City of Asheville to support Information Technology infrastructure strategic planning.
descript.supplinf: Recieved from Jonathan Vascellero (Design Engineer, Charter Communications) on 11/13/2007 in TAB format. Coverted to ESRI geodatabase format with SafeSoftware FTE workbench. Contact information for Mr. Vascellero is as follows: 1670 Hendersonville Road Asheville, NC 28803 828-209-2288 Office 828-545-9469 Cell 828-209-2191 fax

idinfo.accconst: security sensitive, not for public distribution
idinfo.useconst: security sensitive, not for public distribution
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

citeinfo.title: Charter Fiber
citeinfo.othercit: Mr. Vascellero (Charter Communications): 1670 Hendersonville Road Asheville, NC 28803 828-209-2288 Office

srcinfo.srccontr: Recieved from Jonathan Vascellero (Design Engineer, Charter Communications) on 11/13/2007 in TAB format. Coverted to ESRI geodatabase format with SafeSoftware FTE workbench.

citeinfo.title: City of Asheville Fiber Lines
citeinfo.othercit: Information gathered from Gilbert Domingo in the City of Asheville IT Department.

srcinfo.srccontr: Source provides location information of City of Asheville owned fiber lines.

citeinfo.title: ERC fiber lines
citeinfo.othercit: Source from Hunter Gooseman and Lewis Lance at ERC Broadband.

srcinfo.srccontr: Received South ring from Hunter Gooseman 1/29/08 and North ring from Lewis Lance 6/13/08.

procstep.procdesc: Geodatabase feature class created from TAB format data using FME.
Digitized City-owned fiber lines by following aerial photography.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
